item.title: Date and Time of Accident 31st December 2025 at 14:00 pm, A Lady got into difficulty when she was near the pedestrian traffic lights and tripped and fell, 31st December
item.description:
I was able to get some secondary sources from the internet but the cobbled/stone/raised textured surface which was (located near to the traffic light buttons near to The Artful Duke Pub) was a barrier to the lady who sustained some injuries to her face and her arm. So she was not able to move, however there were some active bystanders who were also participating in helping this lady (including her son). There was also part of the road blocked off due some maintenance works at Market Square in Bromley so lucky the ambulance was redirected promptly as everyone including the injured lady standing with or near to her was quite shocked. So I would be grateful if there was some better signage or lighting as well to prevent such falls or accidents from occurring in the futher. I do also apologise for firstly reporting this very late after the accident and for the description but that is my fault due to having other things planned for the day and with the timing of reporting the accident at the end of the year but I watched from a distance as the ambulance arrived from the redirected route.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 196-198, High Street, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime Bikes, constant wheelchair, safety issue, 31st December
item.description:
